<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shield of Grace](/Feats.aspx?ID=5926) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=811" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 99 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Shield Warden](/Feats.aspx?ID=4807)

</column>

---

You protect an ally with both your shield and your body. Whenever you use the [Shield Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=5212) reaction to prevent damage to an ally, you can evenly split the remaining damage after the Shield Block between the ally and yourself.
name: Shield of Grace
